title: Can People See If You Look At Their Instagram? Explained

steps.title: Instagram doesn't give notifications for profile views.
steps.content: Instagram doesn't give notifications for profile views. If you simply visit another user's Instagram profile page, the user won't know. However, certain actions will notify the user, such as viewing their Story or Highlights (within 48 hours) and liking one of their posts. If you're worried about other people seeing your profile, consider making your account private .

steps.title: Yes, Instagram shows who views a Story.
steps.content: Yes, Instagram shows who views a Story. If you watch another user's Story, you will appear on a list that the user can see. This can be easily checked in the Story options and stats , so be sure to avoid tapping any Stories if you want to remain undetected. If it has been over 48 hours since the Highlight was posted, you can watch it freely without notifying the user. Reels can be watched without being detected; just be sure you don't like the video. There are ways to view Instagram stories and Highlights anonymously, such as using an alternate account.

steps.title: Tap your profile picture.
steps.content: Tap your profile picture. This is in the bottom-right corner. You may also see a person icon. Use this method to make your account private. This will prevent users from seeing your profile and content unless they follow you. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Tap ☰.
steps.content: Tap ☰ . This is in the top-right corner. A pop-up menu will open.

steps.title: Tap Account privacy.
steps.content: Tap Account privacy . You can find this underneath the Who can see your content header.

steps.title: Toggle on "Private account".
steps.content: Toggle on "Private account". You'll need to tap Switch to private to confirm . Your account will now be private.
